name: Hide Priceless products
author: Giovanni Malagnino Consulting

sections.description:
Have you ever wanted to hide products from your WooCommerce store that were either priced at zero or which price is simply uninformed? With this plugin, it is possible very easily! Hide products without price, and hide products with price set to 0.
Now you can even select categories of products that you want to keep visible. What else? Just ask!
sections.installation:
WooCommerce needs to be installed

  1. Upload folder hide-priceless-products to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

You find the settings under WooCommerce -> Settings -> Products
sections.faq:
Where do I find the settings?

The settings can be found in the WooCommerce -> Settings -> Products general tab, at the bottom of the page. See also screenshot.
sections.changelog:
1.1.1

  • Tested with WordPress 5.2 and WooCommerce 3.6.3. Please let me know if you find any bug!
  • Corrected wrong behaviour when viewing a category page

1.1.0

  • NEW FEATURE! You can now select categories of products you want to keep visible!

1.0.2

  • Tested with WordPress 5.1 and WooCommerce 3.5.5

1.0.1

  • Minor bug resolution when plugin was activated

1.0

  • First release

short_description: This plugin lets you to choose if you want to display the products without price or with a price set to 0
